title: Call bank on Friday
text: A discrepancy in the amount $150 was paid to the supplier

title: Reschedule delivery
text: The weather is rough for delivery of the fragile items on this coming Thursday and arrange with the client for the delivery to be scheduled to next week.

title: Finish Payroll
text: Payroll run is to be scheduled and finish before the end of the month.  Payroll Journals need to be processed by 31st of the month.

title: Check with clients
text: Checking with the clients with returns that need to be done.

title: Client lunch on Thursday
text: Booked lunch with client at Far End Cellars, Adelaide at 12.30 pm to discuss future software development

title: Spotlight Reporting
text: Synchronise data with XERO and complete reporting by 3rd working day of the following month.
